title: 11 Printed Midi Dresses Perfect For Transitional Weather
description: Printed dresses are arguably one of the most essential styles to have on hand for transitional weather. From a morning brunch to a happy hour date, a printed dress really is the ultimate frock - perfect for helping you to create a lightweight, hassle-free outfit that will still keep you looking fresh through even the busiest schedules. When it comes to playful fall fashion, we're convinced that perhaps the only thing better than a printed dress is a halter, cutout, and maxi printed dress. We love a good pattern as much as the next fashionista - especially if it helps to elevate an otherwise breezy or minimalistic style with a more statement-making touch. So it's no surprise that we're equally as taken with the bold elegance provided by a chic, printed dress. Spend a few minutes browsing the internet for one of these styles and you'll find, evidently, that there are a lot of printed dress options to shop at the moment - with gowns that feature everything from geometric designs and floral-adorned prints to so many other eye-catching styles that are perfect for nailing all your fall weddings and events, no matter the dress code. We've shopped out a few of our favorite printed dresses below, with styles from Amazon, Nordstrom, Asos, Anthropologie, and more. Read on to browse our picks. Related: The 13 Best Nordstrom Bags For Every Fall Occasion
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: These styles NEED to be on your radar. ðŸ‘€
text: Skip to main contentWhile each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.Printed dresses are arguably one of the most essential styles to have on hand for transitional weather. From a morning brunch to a happy hour date, a printed dress really is the ultimate frock â€” perfect for helping you to create a lightweight, hassle-free outfit that will still keep you looking fresh through even the busiest schedules. When it comes to playful fall fashion, we're convinced that perhaps the only thing better than a printed dress is a halter, cutout, and maxi printed dress. We love a good pattern as much as the next fashionista â€” especially if it helps to elevate an otherwise breezy or minimalistic style with a more statement-making touch. So it's no surprise that we're equally as taken with the bold elegance provided by a chic, printed dress. Spend a few minutes browsing the internet for one of these styles and you'll find, evidently, that there are a lot of printed dress options to shop at the moment â€” with gowns that feature everything from geometric designs and floral-adorned prints to so many other eye-catching styles that are perfect for nailing all your fall weddings and events, no matter the dress code. We've shopped out a few of our favorite printed dresses below, with styles from Amazon, Nordstrom, Asos, Anthropologie, and more. Read on to browse our picks. 01amazon.comBest Sleeveless Printed DressSuillty Tie Dye Tank Dress ($24) As much as we love an eccentric print, we also know that some styles are timeless enough for wear in any season â€” and this tie-dye dress is a great example of that. The colorful and versatile design provides a fall-friendly revamp to the classic dress style. Best of all, the sleeveless silhouette means it's incredibly breathable and comfortable to slip into â€” it's the perfect fuss-free vacation and late afternoon dress. 02target.comBest Spotted Wrap DressMissky Plus Size Wrap Split Dress ($39, originally $43) Maybe it's the influence of this fall's retro fashion trends, but we're convinced there may not be anything more darling than a spotted dress. Just look at this neutral frock for further proof. From the subtle ballon sleeves to the cinched waist, there's just so much to love about this maxi. 03amazon.comBest Printed Wrap Midi DressZesica Summer Bohemian Floral Printed Dress ($50) This relaxed wrap dress has us wishing that it was festival season all over again â€” but we'll gladly sport it throughout the fall months, too. The printed midi dress is adorned with delicate floral designs and features a cool, wrap-around design which creates a universally flattering fit. Wear it with white sneakers for a casual daytime look or swap out your trainers for a pair of mules come nighttime.04amazon.comBest Puff-Sleeved Printed Midi DressSissyaki Summer Boho Dress ($54) Even if you're not big on incorporating color into your wardrobe, this flounced midi dress is sure to infuse some lighter hues without feeling too overbearing. The style seamlessly blends multiple summer trends into one effortless fit, with its flowy skirt, fit-and-flare shape, presidential puff sleeves, and refreshing color palette that leans into lime green and yellow hues.05nordstrom.comBest Floral Printed Midi DressPetal & Pup Kelda Floral Midi Dress ($79) Puff sleeves and dainty floral detailing, consider this your sign to finally embrace your inner Diane Keaton. The Petal & Pup number features an adjustable drawstring to cinch the waist and is super breathable. Overall, it's a great dress to add to your daytime edit. 06anthropologie.comBest Mesh Printed Midi DressAnthropologie AFRM Praya Off-The-Shoulder Mesh Maxi Dress ($118) When it comes to printed dresses, you can never go wrong with a classic â€” especially if it's as chic as this mesh style from Anthropologie. The elegant slip features a flattering off-the-shoulder neckline design up top, with abstract accents, stretchy long sleeves, and a lightweight fit that's perfect for wearing to fall weddings or dinner events. 08neimanmarcus.comBest Colorful Printed DressStaud Katie Colorblock Square-Neck Sheath Midi Dress ($221, originally $295) If you're looking to add some more color into your wardrobe this season, look no further than this printed dress from Staud. Besides the style's shapely design â€” which features a unique geometric pattern of squares, dots, and lines all throughout â€” we also appreciate the dress's open neckline, which is perfect for putting your favorite necklace on full display. 09zara.comBest All-Over Printed Halter Midi DressZara Silk Printed Dress ($229) All hail the halter dress! We're so obsessed with the chicness of this printed style in particular. Thanks to the frock's dual coloring and floral pattern, it's almost like shoppers get a two-in-one dress option. The darker color tones make this a perfect transitional style that you can wear all fall long. Plus, it's a darling (and formal enough) option to have on hand for the busy wedding season. 10farmrio.comBest Printed Midi Dress With CutoutsFarm Rio Black and White Cutout Long Sleeve Midi Dress ($248) This printed dress from Farm Rio just screams resort-ready â€” and we're already feeling inspired to RSVP to a posh vacation because of it. The midi dress is defined by the yin-and-yang colors and a subtle neck that teases a little skin via the cutouts. It's semi-formal to wear out to a nice dinner or restaurant, too. Pair it with mules or heeled boots for a look that you'll be excited to pack into your personal carry-on and sport on your next oceanside adventure. 11freepeople.comBest Long-Sleeved Printed Midi DressFree People Selkie The Poet Printed Slip Dress ($398) Romance is back. From the dance floor to an evening soirÃ©e, this long-sleeved dress will fit perfectly into any dress code. Spruce up the style with a pair of statement stilettos or nude flats, and you've got an elegant fall outfit â€” adorned with the fairy-tale inspired design that's bound to turn heads in any room. - Additional reporting by Kyley Warren and Natasha MarshKyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
html:
Skip to main content

While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

Printed dresses are arguably one of the most essential styles to have on hand for transitional weather. From a morning brunch to a happy hour date, a printed dress really is the ultimate frock â€” perfect for helping you to create a lightweight, hassle-free outfit that will still keep you looking fresh through even the busiest schedules.

When it comes to playful fall fashion, we're convinced that perhaps the only thing better than a printed dress is a halter, cutout, and maxi printed dress. We love a good pattern as much as the next fashionista â€” especially if it helps to elevate an otherwise breezy or minimalistic style with a more statement-making touch. So it's no surprise that we're equally as taken with the bold elegance provided by a chic, printed dress.

Spend a few minutes browsing the internet for one of these styles and you'll find, evidently, that there are a lot of printed dress options to shop at the moment â€” with gowns that feature everything from geometric designs and floral-adorned prints to so many other eye-catching styles that are perfect for nailing all your fall weddings and events, no matter the dress code.

We've shopped out a few of our favorite printed dresses below, with styles from Amazon, Nordstrom, Asos, Anthropologie, and more. Read on to browse our picks.

01

Best Sleeveless Printed Dress

Suillty Tie Dye Tank Dress ($24)

As much as we love an eccentric print, we also know that some styles are timeless enough for wear in any season â€” and this tie-dye dress is a great example of that. The colorful and versatile design provides a fall-friendly revamp to the classic dress style. Best of all, the sleeveless silhouette means it's incredibly breathable and comfortable to slip into â€” it's the perfect fuss-free vacation and late afternoon dress.

02

Best Spotted Wrap Dress

Missky Plus Size Wrap Split Dress ($39, originally $43)

Maybe it's the influence of this fall's retro fashion trends, but we're convinced there may not be anything more darling than a spotted dress. Just look at this neutral frock for further proof. From the subtle ballon sleeves to the cinched waist, there's just so much to love about this maxi.

03

Best Printed Wrap Midi Dress

Zesica Summer Bohemian Floral Printed Dress ($50)

This relaxed wrap dress has us wishing that it was festival season all over again â€” but we'll gladly sport it throughout the fall months, too. The printed midi dress is adorned with delicate floral designs and features a cool, wrap-around design which creates a universally flattering fit. Wear it with white sneakers for a casual daytime look or swap out your trainers for a pair of mules come nighttime.

04

Best Puff-Sleeved Printed Midi Dress

Sissyaki Summer Boho Dress ($54)

Even if you're not big on incorporating color into your wardrobe, this flounced midi dress is sure to infuse some lighter hues without feeling too overbearing. The style seamlessly blends multiple summer trends into one effortless fit, with its flowy skirt, fit-and-flare shape, presidential puff sleeves, and refreshing color palette that leans into lime green and yellow hues.

05

Best Floral Printed Midi Dress

Petal & Pup Kelda Floral Midi Dress ($79)

Puff sleeves and dainty floral detailing, consider this your sign to finally embrace your inner Diane Keaton. The Petal & Pup number features an adjustable drawstring to cinch the waist and is super breathable. Overall, it's a great dress to add to your daytime edit.

06

Best Mesh Printed Midi Dress

Anthropologie AFRM Praya Off-The-Shoulder Mesh Maxi Dress ($118)

When it comes to printed dresses, you can never go wrong with a classic â€” especially if it's as chic as this mesh style from Anthropologie. The elegant slip features a flattering off-the-shoulder neckline design up top, with abstract accents, stretchy long sleeves, and a lightweight fit that's perfect for wearing to fall weddings or dinner events.

08

Best Colorful Printed Dress

Staud Katie Colorblock Square-Neck Sheath Midi Dress ($221, originally $295)

If you're looking to add some more color into your wardrobe this season, look no further than this printed dress from Staud. Besides the style's shapely design â€” which features a unique geometric pattern of squares, dots, and lines all throughout â€” we also appreciate the dress's open neckline, which is perfect for putting your favorite necklace on full display.

09

Best All-Over Printed Halter Midi Dress

Zara Silk Printed Dress ($229)

All hail the halter dress! We're so obsessed with the chicness of this printed style in particular. Thanks to the frock's dual coloring and floral pattern, it's almost like shoppers get a two-in-one dress option. The darker color tones make this a perfect transitional style that you can wear all fall long. Plus, it's a darling (and formal enough) option to have on hand for the busy wedding season.

10

Best Printed Midi Dress With Cutouts

Farm Rio Black and White Cutout Long Sleeve Midi Dress ($248)

This printed dress from Farm Rio just screams resort-ready â€” and we're already feeling inspired to RSVP to a posh vacation because of it. The midi dress is defined by the yin-and-yang colors and a subtle neck that teases a little skin via the cutouts. It's semi-formal to wear out to a nice dinner or restaurant, too. Pair it with mules or heeled boots for a look that you'll be excited to pack into your personal carry-on and sport on your next oceanside adventure.

11

Best Long-Sleeved Printed Midi Dress

Free People Selkie The Poet Printed Slip Dress ($398)

Romance is back. From the dance floor to an evening soirÃ©e, this long-sleeved dress will fit perfectly into any dress code. Spruce up the style with a pair of statement stilettos or nude flats, and you've got an elegant fall outfit â€” adorned with the fairy-tale inspired design that's bound to turn heads in any room.

- Additional reporting by Kyley Warren and Natasha Marsh

Kyley Warren is an award-winning writer, editor, and affiliate strategist with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She currently works as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. She previously worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Natasha Marsh is a freelance writer who writes about fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Prior to freelancing, she held styling staff positions at The Wall Street Journal, Burberry, Cosmopolitan, British GQ, and Harper's Bazaar.
